pr_title: Added support for msvc builds in cpp-qt5-client generator

timeline.message:
Added support for msvc builds

Moved GCC-specific compile flags to non msvc builds, and added equivalent flags for msvc.

timeline.bodyText:
I'd go with
if (MSVC)
...
else ()
...
endif ()

to make it look more like other programming languges.
timeline.author: muttleyxd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,11 @@ set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE ON)
 set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
 set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
 
-set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -fPIC -Wall -Wno-unused-variable")
+if (MSVC)
+    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} /W4")
+else (MSVC)
